---
page_title: "seq_api_key (Resource)"
description: |-
  Manages a Seq API key.
---

# seq_api_key (Resource)

Use this resource to create and manage API keys in Seq via `/api/apikeys`.

Seq may only return the key `token` at creation time; it is stored in Terraform state as a sensitive attribute.

## Example Usage

```terraform
resource "seq_api_key" "ingest" {
  title       = "terraform-ingest"
  permissions = ["Ingest"]
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `title` (String) Human-friendly title for the API key.

### Optional

- `owner_id` (String) Owner principal id. Depending on permissions, you may only be able to set this to yourself.
- `permissions` (Set of String) Permissions delegated to the API key (e.g. Read, Write, Ingest, Project, System).

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) Seq API key id.
- `token` (String, Sensitive) The API key token/secret. Seq may only return this on create; it is stored in state as sensitive.
